hive

Class Beehive

  • java.lang.Object
    • hive.Beehive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Beehive
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Beehive Class. To be run as own thread, as here are lots of information and probably lots of synchronized methods. Plus all the bees.
    Author:
    ole

      • Beehive

        Beehive(int x,
       int y,
       int numOfBees,
       World world,
       int num,
       double hunger)
        Constructor method for beehive class.
        Parameters:
        x - x-position of this beehive
        y - y-position of this beehive
        numOfBees - number of bees
        world - world-object
        num - the number of this beehive in the world
        hunger - how much food does each bee take a time
